content:
BUSINESS RULE: <business term or calculated field>

DEFINITION:
<clear explanation>

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
<which tables are needed>

BUSINESS RULE: Active User

DEFINITION:
A user who has logged in within the last 30 days and has status = 'active'

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
users

BUSINESS RULE: Total Revenue

DEFINITION:
Sum of (price * quantity) for all completed orders

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
orders, order_items

BUSINESS RULE: Project Completion Rate

DEFINITION:
Percentage of completed line items compared to total line items in a project

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
lvl3

BUSINESS RULE: Project Total Cost

DEFINITION:
Sum of (total_price) for all level 3 items in a project

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
lvl3

BUSINESS RULE: Active Project

DEFINITION:
A project that has level 1, level 3, or inventory items associated with it

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
projects, lvl1, lvl3, inventory

BUSINESS RULE: User Project Count

DEFINITION:
Number of unique projects a user has access to across all project types (BOQ, RAN, ROP)

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
user_project_access

BUSINESS RULE: Hardware Items

DEFINITION:
Items where service_type contains '2' (Hardware)

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
lvl3

BUSINESS RULE: Software Items

DEFINITION:
Items where service_type contains '1' (Software)

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
lvl3

BUSINESS RULE: Service Items

DEFINITION:
Items where service_type contains '3' (Service)

SQL EXAMPLE:
Not provided

TABLES INVOLVED:
lvl3
